data.name: Warlander
data.detailed_description:
Would you sell your soul for vengeance? Would you be willing to become a servant of an immortal deity, to have your whole being transformed into a weapon of war and destruction?

Play as a resurrected hero on a warpath of vengeance. Aim precisely and slice through the flesh of your enemies in a ragdoll mayhem! Grow stronger in power, either by chopping your way across the battlefield or by using abilities to turn the environment into a deadly weapon. Wield a blade with a mind of its own while you fight and sacrifice enemies to appease the ancient gods.

Key features:

  • UNIQUE COMBAT SYSTEM featuring skill-based fights with precise targeting of body parts and attractive ragdoll physics.



  • SATISFYING SWORDPLAY giving you the feeling of cutting through real flesh, with unique real time mesh slicing mechanics.



  • VERSATILE COMBAT POWERS based on ancient druidic magic and long forgotten secrets from the darkest parts of the woods.



  • SKILL TREE PROGRESSION is tied with the game world. Hunt your enemies, cut them into offerings and sacrifice them to upgrade your skills and powers.



  • GRIM AND INTENSE WORLD engulfed in colossal clash of hideous entities, with epic story based on revenge, betrayal and a faint glimmer of hope.



  • INTERACTIVE ENVIRONMENT is a battlefield itself and a weapon. Be observant, think on your feet and use the terrain to crush your enemies and progress through the levels.

data.short_description: Warlander is a single player third-person action-RPG that combines story-driven adventure with a fast-paced swordplay system that creates a visceral gameplay experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-4160 (3.6 GHz) / AMD A6-5400K APU (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti with 2 GB VRAM / Radeon R7 370 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3930K (3.2 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 (3.2 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 with 4 GB VRAM / AMD Radeon RX 570 with 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes:
Warlander is action-adventure RPG game with real-time mesh slicing. Players can literally cut through their enemies and chop them to pieces during combat. 
There is also a scene that involves violence against children, but it is not graphically shown and it serves as emotional and storyline turning point rather than shock value.
There will be graphical bosses and enemies.
